effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.
flavor_text.platinum: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.
